name: ROGUEMARS
description:
This is a prototipe done in 2 weeks by one person.

It's a student project.

It's a Top Down Shooter Rogue Like where you need to find oxygen from de minerals on the enviroment, iif you run out of oxygen you will lose. The map is generated prodcedurally.

Controls:

W,A,S,D ->  Movement

LMB -> Shoot

Spacebar -> Dash
